It is failing for me on mac osx, though:
~~~
[ RUN      ] PkgConfig.CC
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "boost::system::system_category()", referenced from:
      ___cxx_global_var_init5 in hello_world-01402b.o
      boost::asio::error::get_system_category() in hello_world-01402b.o
…
~~~

EDIT: I made sure to `brew unlink sdformat` before building the branch and running the test.

I'm going to run a home-brew jenkins job as well, since those machines are using 10.9.

content.raw:
Update as of 3f1ef5b: 

merged from [fix_pkgconfig_4.0_examples](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/2371076) branch and with the [changes in CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1171/fix-gazebo-pkg-config/diff#LCMakeLists.txtT298), the pkgconfig regression test is now passing and the examples are compiling.

Latest jenkins reports: 

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew_bcn-amd64/136/)

[trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/156/)
